items.sentence: We asked Tom if he would help us paint our house.
Tom was angry. That's why he didn't say anything.
Those problems will be solved in the near future.
How do you know when you're in love with someone?

My wife prepares very good meals in this kitchen.
Your stupid remark just added fuel to the flames.

My brother married his friend's sister last year.
I had a coat on because it was cold this morning.

I don't want to stick my nose into your business.

I'd hardly put the phone down when it rang again.
